LanguageData.MSSMeme_Gaslighting_Start:
A commenter is loudly and continuously complaining that you have no idea what you're doing because {0}. They're arguing so hard you're beginning to doubt yourself and wonder if they're actually right.

Surely not!


... unless...
LanguageData.MSSMeme_Gaslighting_End: Having finally been shouted down, the commenter has stopped insisting that {0}. You feel vindicated and like the world is a little less insane.\n\nIt's a good job you haven't just rebuilt half the base to accomodate their nonsense...
LanguageData.MSSMeme_GaslightingTopic_DarkSolar: solar panels only work in the dark
LanguageData.MSSMeme_WhereRimRimLetterText:
It's 18:00, where RimRim!

Any RimRims currently under your control may throw a tantrum if they don't get their daily RimRim soon.

Yes, this is expected every single day with no breaks for illness, holiday or sewage leaking into your house. Get used to it.
LanguageData.MSSMeme_SpawnFireDesc: Flames lick at the heels of this creature
LanguageData.MSSMeme_SpawnTerrainDesc: allow this creature to leave behind a trail of {0}
LanguageData.MSSMeme_SpawnFireSizeDesc: Command this creature to concentrate and exude more flame.
LanguageData.MSSMeme_GotoDesc: Send this perfectly innocuous creature to a specific location.
